name: linkedin-mcp-server
description: Connect Claude to LinkedIn for profiles, companies, and job details
long_description:
# LinkedIn MCP Server

Connect Claude to your LinkedIn account. Access profiles, companies, and job postings through a Docker container on your machine.

## Features
- **Profile Access**: Get detailed LinkedIn profile information including work history, education, and skills
- **Company Profiles**: Extract comprehensive company information and details
- **Job Details**: Retrieve job posting information from LinkedIn URLs
- **Job Search**: Search for jobs with keywords and location filters

## First-Time Setup
Create a session using one of these methods:
1. **Cookie**: Pass your `li_at` cookie via `LINKEDIN_COOKIE` environment variable - session will be created and stored automatically
2. **Browser login**: Use the [uvx setup](https://github.com/stickerdaniel/linkedin-mcp-server#-uvx-setup-recommended---universal) to log in interactively - session will be stored and used by this extension

## Requirements
- Docker installed and running

⚠️ Use responsibly and in accordance with LinkedIn's Terms of Service.
